item.description:
Once again Four on the Floor returns to NE Seafood and they are truly my favorite band! This will be the last meetup of the Merrimack Valley Single Friends. It would be great to see many of you there as we end this chapter. Come join me on the dance floor!

NE Seafood is easy to get to off of Route 93. The band starts at 9. Please RSVP if you would like to get dinner earlier.

Please note: NE Seafood is NOT taking reservations during Lent. If this impacts your choice to meet for dinner please update your response. There may be a wait for a table but there will be no cover charge ($5.00) if you have dinner. Please send me an email through the link under Organizer if you plan to meet for dinner. Sorry for any inconvenience.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dance at New England Seafood with Four on the Floor
